ORG.oclc.oai.server.crosswalk
Class XML2oai_etdms

java.lang.Object
  ORG.oclc.oai.server.crosswalk.Crosswalk
      ORG.oclc.oai.server.crosswalk.XML2oai_etdms

public class XML2oai_etdms
extends Crosswalk

Convert native "item" to oai_etdms. In this case, the native "item" is assumed to already be formatted as an OAI element, with the possible exception that multiple metadataFormats may be present in the element. The "crosswalk", merely involves pulling out the one that is requested.

          The constructor assigns the schemaLocation associated with this crosswalk.

Constructor Detail

XML2oai_etdms

public XML2oai_etdms(java.util.Properties properties)
The constructor assigns the schemaLocation associated with this crosswalk. Since the crosswalk is trivial in this case, no properties are utilized.

Parameters:
properties - properties that are needed to configure the crosswalk.
Method Detail

isAvailableFor

public boolean isAvailableFor(java.lang.Object nativeItem)
Can this nativeItem be represented in ETDMS format?

Specified by:
isAvailableFor in class Crosswalk
Parameters:
nativeItem - a record in native format
Returns:
true if ETDMS format is possible, false otherwise.

createMetadata

public java.lang.String createMetadata(java.lang.Object nativeItem)
                                throws CannotDisseminateFormatException
Perform the actual crosswalk.

Specified by:
createMetadata in class Crosswalk
Parameters:
nativeItem - the native "item". In this case, it is already formatted as an OAI element, with the possible exception that multiple metadataFormats are present in the element.
Returns:
a String containing the XML to be stored within the element.
Throws:
CannotDisseminateFormatException - nativeItem doesn't support this format.
